name: Grooming Adventure
description:
Welcome!

Thank you for looking at this page.

It's a cute, side-view 2D adventure game.
You have to be a cat and visit your master.
Various obstacles will haunt you.
If you walk past the obstacle toward the can, you can meet your owner.

Features

- If you walk past the obstacle toward the can, you can meet your owner.
- You can do something by attacking.
- Additional life can be obtained at bonus stage.
- Compete with your friends with your time and your life.
- Prove Your Skills in Challenge Mode.
- To be easy.

Playtime will be set according to your skill.
We are not responsible for your keyboard.

Have a Good game.
